summary.en: Little Rabbit learns to share and plants a beautiful carrot garden with friends.

en: Once upon a time, there was a little rabbit named Whitey who loved carrots very much.
Whitey had a dream: to have his own carrot garden.
Every day, Whitey worked hard in the garden, watering, weeding, and fertilizing.
Gradually, the carrot sprouts grew, with green leaves shining in the sunlight.
Little Squirrel, Little Bird, and Little Hedgehog saw Whitey's garden and were envious.
Whitey thought for a moment and decided to invite his friends to plant together.
Working together, the garden became even more beautiful.
When harvest time came, Whitey and his friends shared the delicious carrots together.
Whitey learned: the joy of sharing is more beautiful than having alone!

summary.en: A little star overcomes fear and helps lost animals find their way home.

en: In the distant sky, there was a little star named Sparkle.
Sparkle was always afraid of the dark and hid behind clouds at night.
One night, Sparkle heard crying from the ground below.
It was a little rabbit who was lost and couldn't find the way home.
Although afraid, Sparkle gathered courage and jumped out from behind the clouds.
Sparkle shone brightly, lighting the way home for the little rabbit.
The little rabbit safely returned home and was very grateful to Sparkle.
From then on, Sparkle was no longer afraid of the dark.
She learned: helping others makes you braver!

summary.en: Little animals learn the importance of keeping promises through the rainbow bridge.

en: In the forest, there was a magical rainbow bridge that only animals who kept their promises could cross.
Little Fox, Little Deer, and Little Bear all wanted to cross the rainbow bridge to see the beautiful scenery.
But first, they had to complete a task: help Grandpa Tree find his lost seeds.
Little Fox promised but soon forgot and went to play.
Little Deer also promised but found it too troublesome and gave up.
Only Little Bear searched seriously and didn't give up, finally finding the seeds.
When Little Bear returned the seeds to Grandpa Tree, the rainbow bridge appeared.
Little Bear crossed the rainbow bridge and saw the most beautiful scenery in the world.
Little Fox and Little Deer learned: keeping promises brings true happiness!

summary.en: Little Elephant achieves his dream of flying through effort and friends' help.

en: Little Elephant BoBo had a special dream: he wanted to fly in the sky like birds.
Other animals laughed at him, saying how could an elephant fly?
But BoBo didn't give up and practiced every day.
The birds saw BoBo's efforts and decided to help him.
The birds made a beautiful hot air balloon with leaves and flowers.
BoBo got into the balloon and slowly rose into the sky.
BoBo saw beautiful scenery he had never seen before and was very happy.
He learned: with dreams, effort, and friends' help, anything is possible!
From then on, BoBo often went on adventures with his friends in the hot air balloon.
